record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL 10 A.M. TOMORROW

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate and if the Republican leader has no further business to come before the Senate, I would ask the Senate stand adjourned under the previous order, but if my esteemed colleague does wish to speak, there is ample time to do that.
I say to friend from Nevada, I have nothing further to add.
I ask unanimous consent that the Senate stand adjourned.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 6:54 p.m., adjourned until Wednesday, March 14, 2007, at 10 a.m.
